ygData.subject: RE: Am I missing something? Does the aqualung.. um .. Suck?
ygData.msgSnippet: Has anybody ever confirmed clockwork pets?  I ve always been under the impression that this was a rumor.  Back in beta 3 they mentioned that plans to allow
ygData.messageBody:
Has anybody ever confirmed clockwork pets? I've always been under the
impression that this was a rumor. Back in beta 3 they mentioned that plans
to allow clockwork pets had been scrapped. I never saw any in beta 2 so I
assumed that meant they'd never had any at all.

-----Original Message-----
From: "Stauss, Aaron" <Aaron.Stauss@...>

Just my 2 cents. I for one am happy tinkering finally has
some kewl stuff to make. Now if only they would put back in the Jet Pack,
and the pet rat/spider/gnome.
